nl.OfficeStringId.MenuCmd_FloatingObjectBri: Bring the selected object forward one level, or bring it in front of all the other objects.

Bring the selected object in front of all other objects so that no part of it is hidden behind other objects.
nl.OfficeStringId.MenuCmd_FloatingObjectSen: Send the selected object back one level, or send it behind all the other objects.

nl.XtraRichEditStringId.MenuCmd_ParagraphAl:
Align text to both left and right margins.

Space will be added between characters and words. If the last line is short, extra spaces will be added between the characters to make it match the width of the paragraph.

Tekst uitlijnen op zowel de linker- als rechtermarge. Hierbij wordt de ruimte tussen woorden vergroot wanneer dit nodig is.

De linker- en de rechterzijde van de pagina zien er dan overzichtelijker uit.

Align text to both left and right margins.

Specifies that a paragraph uses the kashida with the widest length for Arabic text. For other languages, paragraph text is justified with the widest inter-word spacing.

Align text to both left and right margins.

If the language is Arabic, the paragraph uses small length Kashida. In other languages, text is justified with short inter-word spacing.

Align text to both left and right margins.

If the language is Arabic, the paragraph uses medium-length Kashida. In other languages, text is justified with wider inter-word spacing.
Align text to both left and right margins by adding extra space between each two characters for languages with tone mark and vowel mark.
nl.XtraRichEditStringId.MenuCmd_ParagraphLe: Set the text to read from right to left.
nl.XtraRichEditStringId.MenuCmd_ParagraphRi: Set the text to read from left to right.
